text: The 8th Macau International Movie Festival ceremony (), organized by the Macau Film and Television Media Association and China International Cultural Communication Center, honored the best films of 2016 in the Greater China Region and took place on 15 December 2016, in Macau.http://movie.mtm.mo/?act=app&appid;=37∣=215&p;=viewhttp://mimf.mtm.mo/?act=app&appid;=37∣=212&p;=view ==Winners and nominees== {| class=wikitable |- | valign="top" width="50%"| *My War *Good Luck, Dad **Xuanzang **Chinese Wine **Lord of Shanghai **Being A Cop | valign="top" width="50%"| *Sherwood Hu – Lord of Shanghai **Fruit Chan – Kill Time **Oxide Pang – My War **Lin Yu-Hsien – Never Said Goodbye **Chen Bin – Perfect Imperfection **Meng Haojun – Being A Cop |- | valign="top" width="50%"| * Hu Jun – Lord of Shanghai * Li Xuejian – The Woman Behind the Man **Huang Xiaoming – Xuanzang **Liu Ye – My War **Ahn Jae-hyun – Perfect Imperfection **Lee Jung-jae – Tik Tok | valign="top" width="50%"| * Zhou Dongyu – Never Said Goodbye **Angelababy – Kill Time **Shu Qi – My Best Friend's Wedding **Tiffany Tang – A Chinese Odyssey Part Three **Ady An – Perfect Imperfection **Wang Luodan – My War |- | valign="top" width="50%"| * Liu Peiqi – Lord of Shanghai **Tony Yang – My War **Ethan Juan – Never Said Goodbye **Luo Jin – Xuanzang **Alex Fong – Perfect Imperfection **Wang Zijian – The Insanity | valign="top" width="50%"| * Ariel Aisin-Gioro – When We Were Young **Yan Ni – Good Luck, Dad **Victoria Song – My Best Friend's Wedding **Karen Mok – A Chinese Odyssey Part Three **Amber Kuo – Lord of Shanghai **Pan Hong – Kill Time |- | valign="top" width="50%"| * Lonely Garden – He Lan **A Chinese Odyssey Part Three – Jeffery Lau **Xuanzang – Zou Jingzhi **My War – Liu Heng **Tik Tok – Ding Xiaoyang **Perfect Imperfection – Chen Huasen | valign="top" width="50%"| *When We Were Young – Florian J.E. Zinke **Tik Tok – Li Shengji **Perfect Imperfection – Sun Ming **Never Say Goodbye – Kim Young- ho **My War – Chan Wai-Lin **Kill Time – Lam Wah-Chuen |- | valign="top" width="50%"| * Jeremy Liu – Lonely Garden * Sanna Chen – Who Stole My Baby * Song Jiayang – Perfect Imperfection | valign="top" width="50%"| *Liang Xiaoliang – Good Luck, Dad *Chen Feihong – My Best Friend's Wedding |- | valign="top" width="50%"| *I Think I Draw | valign="top" width="50%"| *Hua Kai Mo Du – Lord of Shanghai |- | valign="top" width="50%"| *Mr. Johnny Klimek – Lord of Shanghai | valign="top" width="50%"| *'Lonely Garden *Perfect Imperfection |- |} ==References== ==External links== Category:Golden Lotus Awards Macau Category:2016 in Macau Gold
